content:
Hi All - looking to re-institute a Medications WG call cycle - running a poll for timing. Due to my unavailability for Monday 25th September the next meeting will likely be the first week of October. Please to add to the poll and attend the calls if you are in interested in the medications space.

For your consideration as discussed at the last meeting polls on meeting period and day/time preferences.
Meeting Regular Period: https://doodle.com/poll/ggv22hhxpdy282dn
Meeting Day and Time: https://doodle.com/poll/as44atyfrx7sq96e

Poll has closed: Every 2 weeks at Thursday 1pm-2pm Eastern Daylight Savings Time starting 5th October
Please join the WG meeting from your computer, tablet or smartphone.
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/565745829

You can also dial in using your phone.
Australia : +61 3 9008 7863
Access Code: 565-745-829

REMINDER: Medications Working Group Teleconference
Thursday 1pm-2pm Eastern Daylight Savings Time
Please join the WG meeting from your computer, tablet or smartphone.
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/565745829

REMINDER: Medications Working Group Teleconference
Thursday 1pm-2pm Eastern Daylight Savings Time
Please join the WG meeting from your computer, tablet or smartphone.
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/565745829

REMINDER: Medications Working Group Teleconference
Thursday 1pm-2pm Eastern Daylight Savings Time
Please join the WG meeting from your computer, tablet or smartphone.
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/565745829

@Michael Lawley generally looking at localisation of Medication, MedicationDispense
MedicationRequest, MedicationStatement plus items to support uses around these...
